price: Obavljaj namaz kad Sunce s polovine neba krene, pa do noćne tmine, i Kur’an u namazu u zoru uči, jer učenju Kur’ana u namazu u zoru mnogi prisustvuju.
arabic: أَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ لِدُلُوكِ ٱلشَّمۡسِ إِلَىٰ غَسَقِ ٱلَّيۡلِ وَقُرۡءَانَ ٱلۡفَجۡرِۖ إِنَّ قُرۡءَانَ ٱلۡفَجۡرِ كَانَ مَشۡهُودٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: aqimi al-ṣalata lidulūki al-shamsi ilā ghasaqi al-layli waqur'āna al-fajri inna qur'āna al-fajri kāna mashhūdan
